This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSo I was outside grilling some chicken, talking to my mom on the phone when something caught my eye, a black dot moving through the sky in a wierd fluttery type motion. It came down at an angle and then i saw another kinda standing still. Thats when i realized it was not an airplane so I told my mom I had to go that she wouldnt believe it I would call her back. I ran inside my girlfriend and her mom were inside and told them there were 2 ufo outside I needed to grab my video camera. I was in disbelief and so were they my girlfriend comes outside to see. Her eyesight is not that good so she couldnt see and said i was freakin her out so she went back inside. The whole time I thought i was video taping talking to the camera explaining what happened turns out i wasn't. So i lost a good five minutes of video :( but i was able to capture one of them. The duration lasted 10 minutes in total however i only captured a couple minutes before it was out of focus or sight. Contact me with any questions.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
